title: Is there any hope?..
body:
Hello. 
Since couple weeks ago there started to be an issue with ridiculously high ping. 
Internet connection and hardware had not been changed but the ping which in the worst times never went higher than 300 now is average 600 with spikes at 1000. What could cause it?
 Playing is impossible, screen freezes for 5-6 seconds all the time. Too sad to be skipping  whole invasion...{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
The most common cases of higher ping like this are local issues or how your ISP is routing to the game server.  Start off with the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in a custom game to help troubleshoot.

You can also run a traceroute with [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to see if your ISP is having any hiccups getting to us.  You'll want to direct it to the NA game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes and let me know what you get.
